author: andreasmyth
msg: Fixed class names in some extensions fragments.
Moved GreeterTest from rt2-frontend-jaxws into systests2 - in order to find all extensions on which there is no explicit dependency in rt2-frontend-jaxws.
The test still fails with a ClassCastException but the bus is initialises and the soap binding factory activated via ns through the extension manager.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Removed hierarchical structure of Configuration objects - ConfigurationBuilder to manage a flat map of Configuration objects keyed by CompoundName instead (both api/rt and api2/rt2).
Added config metadata mapping info for bus and instrumentation manager configuration.
Removed createProviderConfiguration/createConsumerConfiguration in jbi service unit implementation - not necessary as configuration builder is not static any more.
Added getId() to bus API so that retrieval of bus id does not require access to bus configuration (api2/rt2 only).

author: mmao
msg: * The RPC interceptor unit tests should check if the process has any exceptions.

author: ffang
msg: using static way to access static field

author: dandiep
msg: o Add ChainInitiationObserver which starts a message flow when a Destination receives a message.o Create a ServerImpl
o Add commented out lines for Configuration building to CeltixBus which breaks CeltixBusTest
o Add commented out unit tests GreeterTest and EndpointImplTest which fail because the bus configuration  won't load."
